item.title: Sleep
item.description: Sleeps for a custom number of seconds set by sleepTime: ---runtime:shellcode:| sleep $sleepTimeinputProperties:- name:'sleepTime'type:numbertitle:'Sleep Time (s)'placeHolder:'Number input'minimum:1maximum:600defaultValue:30
